fields.description: A delightful interpretation of a classic style. It has a deep amber color and an exceptionally full-bodied, complex character. Generous quantities of premium Cascade hops give the Pale Ale its fragrant bouquet and spicy flavor.
fields.name: Sierra Nevada Pale Ale clone

fields.name: Zombie Dust clone
